title: Tesla plans six-seat Model Y, production slated for 2025 in China, sources say
description: Tesla plans to produce a six-seat version of its Model Y in China by late 2025, seeking to enhance its appeal in the competitive electric vehicle market. The Shanghai factory is preparing for a production boost despite awaiting expansion approval. This move comes as domestic rivals introduce competitive models with roomier interiors at lower prices.
